alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 16 at 1:43PM MDT until October 17 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 28 to 32 degrees. * WHERE...Most of the plains of northeast Colorado. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold, like covering with layers of blankets or newspapers. Drain outdoor above ground sprinkler systems.
